ItemTooltips.clarity: Mana regen for spamming stun in lane. Because its fun.
ItemTooltips.courier: Because you're not going to find anyone else buying this if they see you pick ogre.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: This item is a must buy every game as ogre, unless you have no idea how to have fun in this game. In that case youre a loser Drow picker who doesn't find it fun to instagib a CM with 2 4x multicasts.
ItemTooltips.soul_ring: Good for getting an extra nuke off. He can afford losing the 150 HP.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Ogre has terrible INT gain and high mana costs.

AbilityTooltips.ogre_magi_fireblast: This spell is alot of fun once you hit level 6.
AbilityTooltips.ogre_magi_ignite: Good slow. Good for slowing enemies while you beat them with your club.
AbilityTooltips.ogre_magi_bloodlust: Better early and mid game than late game. Give this buff to everyone because movespeed is nice.
